TopicTitle: Game resolution problem（游戏分辨率问题）

Articles.Content:
The game has bugs. In the Settings, after adjusting the resolution to 1920*1200, the resolution will return to the maximum screen resolution when switching game scenes (such as from the Aircraft Sssembly Building to the Launch Platform), when all UI interfaces will be small and inconvenient to view. The computer I used was Microsoft Surface Book 2 (15-inch), with a screen resolution of 3240 by 2160. Game version 1.8.1.2694 (Windows player x64) zh-cn

游戏有漏洞。在设置中，将分辨率调整至1920*1200后，当切换游戏场景时（比如从飞行器组装大楼到发射平台），分辨率将回到最大屏幕分辨率，这时所有的UI界面都会很小，查看不方便。我使用的电脑是微软的Surface Book 2（15英寸），屏幕分辨率3240×2160。游戏版本1.8.1.2694（Windows player x64）zh-cn
